name: Arcade Archives: Tutankham
description: Seek out the lost treasure of Tutankham!

name: Gallop Glory: Obstacle Racing & Horse Simulator
description: Ride, Bond, Conquer Your equestrian adventure awaits.

name: Zelda 64: Recompiled - Majora's Mask
description: A static recompilation of The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask for PC and Linux, with many enhancements like widescreen support, auto saving and higher resolution. It works through Zelda 64: Recompiled.

name: Jogo de Bejos
description: Help Aninha and Luca kiss while Cookie (my dog) doesn't look, because if he looks he'll get jealous and you'll lose.

name: Unconditional Fate's Season 1 Wrap Up!
description: A short game made to celebrate the completion of season 1 of the webcomic, Unconditional Fate, which is based on "The Little Mermaid" by Hans Christian Anderson. Season 1 Wrap Up reveals some untold stories of the characters that live within Unconditional Fate's universe. Made in RPG Maker the game features both puzzles and visual novel segments.

name: Summer Games Challenge
description: Go for Gold!

name: BMX Wild Run
description: Unleash Your BMX Spirit in the Wild!

name: Grudge Murder: Flight
description: Grudge Murder - Flight is a time-loop horror game set on an airplane.

name: Evergreen: Cacti Expansion
description: Grow new challenges!Spice your matches with new plants and change how your world grows.

name: Evergreen: Pines Expansion
description: Grow new challenges!Spice your matches with new plants and change how your world grows.

name: Free Chess
description: Free Chess is a free physics based chess simulator where you are free to play the game of chess with the freedom of however you like.

name: Cyberpunk Horror
description: Cyberpunk Horror - is a first-person horror game that conveys a real atmosphere of horror in a cyberpunk setting.

name: Midnight Lane
description: It's a short horror experience that deals with the fear of dark city streets. Or maybe it's the fear of the daily routine, when the maniac's break-in is just a deliverance

name: Lust & Legends
description: Embark on a journey of intrigue, romance, and adventure in Lust & Legends, a mature open-world RPG that plunges players into the immersive realm of Astoria. As a squire named Tristan, you must navigate the complexities of a medieval world filled with secrets, mysteries, and desires.

name: Vampire Survivors: Operation Guns
description:
Grab your blaster, join Contra Force, and be the bullet hell in Vampire Survivors: Operation Guns

Assemble a squad of classic Characters and arm yourself with an explosive arsenal of arcade weaponry in this action packed expansion for Vampire Survivors. Blast through thousands of fearsome foes and bonkers bosses from throughout the lauded lineage of Contra games. Persist determinedly through prodigious stages inspired by iconic Konami series, but be prepared for a bullet-hell of a fight, because if your trigger finger lacks stamina, Earth may lack a future.

The DLC adds 11 characters, 22 weapons, 1 large stage, 1 bonus stage, 30 in-game unlocks and a 6 chapter adventure.

name: Chess Tools
description: Learn to play chess with Chess Tools. Learn with tutorials, various tools and learn from many famous games from some of the greatest players!

name: Can Bullet
description: BANG BANG BANG! CAN BULLET has come to your PC! Just shoot the cans and get rid of yesterday's, today's, and tomorrow's frustrations. A simple roguelike shooter, also good for a mid-afternoon coffee break.

name: Five Elements: Ghosts Delivery
description: This is a minimalist puzzle game where players control ghosts with unique traits to transport five elements between nodes. By applying the rules of generation and restraint, they transform or eliminate elements to reach specified quantities and objectives.

name: Evergreen: The Board Game
description: A tree-growing abstract strategy game where you make your planet the greenest and most fertile of all!

name: Kakuriyo
description: Sin descripción

name: Jewel Match Origins 3: Camelot Castle - Collector's Edition
description: Embark on a regal journey with the latest addition to the glittering world of Jewel Match games! Unleash your inner architect as you solve match-3 puzzles and unlock the power to build and design the fabled Camelot Castle. The journey awaits, noble puzzler!

name: Refactoro: Chaotic Farm
description: Bring your robots to help overwhelmed farmers and ranchers restore order to their chaotic lands. Use your programming skills to code the robots to clean fields, assist with cattle, fix pens, and get a share of the farm's profitability.

name: Rainbow Cotton
description:
Dive right into this 3D rail shooter as the young witch Cotton, accompanied by her trusty fairy friend, Silk. Lured by the promise of delicious Willow, help Cotton confront the wicked demon, Tweed, and his legions of followers who have stolen the Legendary Willow from the enchanting land of York Country. Hop on your broomstick and go to town in this wacky adventure!

Rainbow Cotton features exciting gameplay reminiscent of its predecessor, the classic game Panorama Cotton. The game takes you on an arcade-inspired journey through a fantastic world full of surprises and challenges. Every stage in Rainbow Cotton is guarded by peculiar bosses that puts your skills to the test. Collect power-ups, build up your flashy projectiles, and hurl them at colorful enemies. Use powerful magic attacks to clear the screen with fireballs and lightning. Only the most courageous (or stubborn, Willow-obsessed!) witches will prevail!

The charming 3D graphics will leave you mesmerized as you travel through, for example, a cozy moonlit town draped in Christmas lights, a mysterious sunken forest, and a magical castle above the clouds!

name: Texas Border Guard
description: This is a first-person shooter game, the late 21st century, the world is overcrowded, the world is full of hunger and viruses. Small countries have long been crowded in by refugees from all over the world. However, aliens also appeared in this world. Because the whole world is paralyzed.

name: The Murder of Sherlock Holmes
description: Investigate the murder of Sherlock Holmes in an incredible Virtual Reality adventure. Interact with everything in an authentic voxel reconstruction of 221B Baker Street. Search for clues, play the violin, read books and become a oneiric detective in this dreamlike escape room.

name: Dream Mists
description: An adventure title in which the player assumes the role of a character who has lost his memory. During the game you gain new abilities and collect information that will help you discover your true identity and the secrets of your past. Get ready for an adventure.

name: Abyss and Dungeon
description: "Abyss and Dungeon" is a fantasy adventure fighting game.

name: Plot!
description: Plot! - It's got Balls... Bounce around the levels to find The Key, The Lock and finally The Door which leads, inexorably, to more of the same. Avoid the Traps and shoot The Meanies for a chance of collectables, but be quick - you only have 90 seconds!

name: The Butler Did It
description: Battle robots, make friends, and uncover a bizarre conspiracy to avert the apocalypse in this comedy of manners and mayhem with steampunk blasters!

name: Count 427
description:
Count 427 is a horror game with theme of the examine of traffic volume.
You sit on a chair on road as a traffic volume examiner and work. If you press a button when a car passes, you will have an unusual experience. If you find something wrong, take a picture.

name: Mercenary Battle Company: The Reapers
description: Join the race for Ether! Mercenary Battle Company: The Reapers is a fast-paced, roguelite, bullet heaven game in a sci-fi setting. Choose your pilots, customize and upgrade your Mecha Robots, and survive against endless swarms of Xeni. Will you survive long enough?

name: King Arthur: Legion IX
description: Dive into a unique blend of turn-based tactics and character-centric RPGs. Lead the skilled Roman tribune Gaius Julius Mento as he navigates through the dark fantasy realm of Avalon.

name: Casino Boss Simulator
description: Casino Boss Simulator is a casino management simulation game that turns your dream of building a casino empire from scratch into reality. Manage, expand, and lead your own casino empire in the competitive world of gambling.

name: Cyber Manhunt: New World
description: A narrative-driven puzzle game that combines themes of big data, cybersecurity, and artificial intelligence. Play as an AI assistant in a major corporation. Deploy intricate social engineering tactics and expose hidden truths in a world of ambition, deception, and advanced technology.

name: Cluckmech Oasis
description: "Cluckmech Oasis" is a tower defense Roguelike with top-down shooting, players will play the battle chicken and its partners, in the journey to collect a variety of strange defensive machinery, a large number of plant enemies, along the way to escort base vehicles to save the world!

name: Crow Country
description: The year is 1990. Edward Crow has disappeared. The owner of 'Crow Country', he has not been seen since he unexpectedly shut down his park two years ago. The silence is broken when a mysterious young woman named Mara Forest ventures into the heart of the abandoned theme park in order to find him.

name: Pac-Man Mega Tunnel Battle: Chomp Champs
description: Pac-Man Mega Tunnel Battle: Chomp Champs is an online-only Pac-Man eating competition! Eat your way through multiple interconnected mazes using Power Pellets and a variety of Power Items to chomp the Ghosts and opponent PAC-MAN players! Be the last Pac standing at the end of each match in this 64-player Battle Royale to be the Chomp Champ!

name: Mushroom Path
description: Let the mushrooms help you on your journey through the different seasons in this difficult 2D precision platformer that full of dangers around you.Still in early development, more content coming soon!

name: Infinite Seek and Find
description: Welcome to your ultimate hidden object challenge. Infinite Seek and Find offers a wide selection of image sets and customizable difficulty level - from a basic level where only the size matters to the most hardcore challenge, where the colors can trick you.

name: The Bridge Curse 2: The Extrication
description: The Bridge Curse 2: The Extrication is part two of The Bridge Curse series. It's a first-person survival horror game where the player controls four characters during Wen Hua University's "Carnival of Horror." What lurks around the corner is foreboding dread, a few laughs, and of course... pure fear.

name: Rabbit & Steel
description: Rabbit & Steel is a co-op roguelike where rabbits must team up together in raids to investigate strange happenings in the Moonlit Kingdom.

name: 1000xResist
description: Delve into a hyper-cinematic adventure. You are a clone. You live at the world's end. You worship the last surviving human: the Allmother. When a dangerous rumour shatters your faith, you phase through time and memory—to expose a 1000-year-old lie. Relive. Reclaim. Resist.

name: Cryptmaster
description: Say anything in this bizarre dungeon adventure where words control everything. Fill in the blanks with text or voice to uncover lost abilities, solve strange quests, and play unexpected mini-games. Use your words to conquer the crypt and unleash a whole new kind of "spell casting!"

name: Asleep: Ato 1
description: Immersed in her nightmares, in a chaotic reality, confused and all alone. The only safe place is her room, but not forever... She wanders through an empty city and strange places while fleeing from creatures lurking in the darkness to find out what's going on. You are in the skin of Ana Lúcia.

name: Star Salvager
description:
A neo retro / roguelike / action-puzzler

Salvage your way through a sea of space junk and take on the alien horde with the ultimate custom-fitted fighting drone!

Cabinet-style arcade combat mixed with fast-paced combo-making.

name: Animal Well
description: What lurks beneath the surface of this deceptively minimalistic adventure? In Animal Well there is more than what you see. Explore a dense interconnected labyrinth, and unravel its many secrets. Collect items to manipulate your environment in surprising and meaningful ways. Encounter creatures both beautiful and unsettling, and try to survive what lurks in the dark.

name: Little Kitty, Big City
description: You're a curious little kitty with a big personality, on an adventure to find your way back home. Explore the city, make new friends, wear delightful hats, and leave more than a little chaos in your wake. After all, isn't that what cats do best?

name: Dream Engines: Nomad Cities
description:
A survival city-building game with flying cities. Build, automate, and defend a flying city to survive in a wacky, nightmare-infested, post-apocalyptic world full of strange science and dreams.

Advanced society is long gone, the world is overrun by the Dream Plagues. The only survivors are small nomadic tribes that don’t attract too much attention. And now, the discovery of a long-abandoned project of the ancients lights a new hope - the flight-capable Nomad Cities.

name: Souls of Shadow
description: Souls of Shadow seamlessly blends deep role-playing elements with thrilling action combat, delivering an unparalleled adventure for players. Get ready to embrace the challenge, uncover the truth, and save this world engulfed in darkness!

name: Crimes of Passion: The Proposal
description: Crimes of Passion: The Proposal is a short form special of the Crimes of Passion series.

name: Magic Patrol Envoy
description: In the face of many monsters, the best way is to build a strong piece of equipment.

name: Otherworld Legends: Fluffette
description: This content requires the base game Otherworld Legends 战魂铭人 on Steam in order to play.

name: Otherworld Legends: Zilan
description: This content requires the base game Otherworld Legends 战魂铭人 on Steam in order to play.

name: Shrimpwrecked
description: Riding an extra-terrestrial weapon disguised as a guitar, battle to the bottom of the ocean deep to turn the tides of impending worldly destruction; krill or be killed!

name: Party Party Time 2: Party Spirit Pack
description: Let's show your Party Spirit! Enjoy 10 new minigames!

name: Super Hangman
description: Super Hangman: the ultimate kids' word game! With colorful graphics and exciting challenges, it's a fun way to learn new words. Guess right, avoid the hangman, and expand your vocabulary across various topics. Let the word adventure begin!

name: OG Memory: Spring 2K24
description: OG Memory: Spring 2K24 is an casual memory game with stunning images. You have to find all of the correct pairs to complete the game. your best round will be count and always be displayed in game, to compare your rounds. try to reduce your turns every game and set up your new record.

name: Megan's Adventure
description: Megan's Adventure is a 2D platform game, you just have to move, dodge, shoot and enjoy (optional)

name: The Other Side: Tower of Souls Remaster
description: The return of a 2014 classic now fully remastered for modern platforms! Can you resolve a family squabble before the gates to the realm of the dead swing open in this collector's edition of The Other Side: Tower of Souls?

name: Type Galaxy
description: Embark on the ultimate cosmic quest where your typing prowess holds the key to victory! Prepare for an adrenaline-fueled voyage through the stars in Type Galaxy, the definitive typing adventure that will leave your fingers itching for more!

name: Pokémon: The Pit
description: Sin descripción

name: Down The Mountain
description: The lift didn't come back to the mountain station last night. Let's use this opportunity to journey down the mountain along a winding trail, enjoying the handcrafted sights and keeping an eye out for the animals calling this mountain their home. You have your camera with you, so have a fun and relaxing day exploring!

name: AAA Clock: Extreme Legendary
description: Sin descripción

name: Let It Die
description: Let It Die is a small point-and-click adventure game that puts you in the shoes of Laura, an intergalactic delivery person who has been sent on a rather peculiar mission by her company.

name: Art Dash
description: A short Rouge Like game about shapes and colors, its a shooter about using color to your advantage to pop enemies. Inspired by games like enter the Gungeon and binding of Isaac!

name: Hent-Ai Puzzle
description: 'Hent-ai Puzzle' is a puzzle game with a total of 12 sexy women in clothed, bikini or underwear and nude versions. You can switch between these versions and have a good time with 36 sexy pictures

name: OG Puzzlers: Spring 2K24
description: OG Puzzlers: Spring 2K24 is an puzzel game with stunning nature pictures . You have to assemble a single image from random generated indivdual pieces. Combine all of the smart singel frames into one big image and unlock the next level.

name: Art Jigsaw Puzzles
description: Like jigsaw puzzles? Hundreds of famous painting jigsaw puzzles welcome you to challenge.

name: Master of Pieces: Jigsaw Puzzle - Timeless Heritage
description: Step into the past with Timeless Heritage, where every puzzle holds a piece of the history. Enjoy 36 gorgeous puzzles.

name: Idle Champions: Classic Nordom Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Nordom (if you don't already own them) Classic Nordom (Fourth Edition) Skin Classic Nordom (First Edition) Skin An Epic Feat for Nordom 7 Gold Nordom Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Idle Champions: High Harper Jaheira Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Jaheira (if you don't already own them) High Harper Jaheira Skin An Epic Feat for Jaheira 7 Gold Jaheira Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Find the Orange Narwhal
description: Overcome your crippling hangover and work out how to get the Narwhal back! Point-and-click your way around town, run errands, and uncover the mystery. But choose who you help carefully - your decisions may come back to bite you! Think outside the box and brace yourself for a fever-dream adventure!

name: Fighting Frontier
description: The three-day doujin convention has opened, but many troublemakers have shown up. Fighting Frontier is a small comedy 3D third-person action game with 3 levels. Knock those troublemakers down before they break the roadblocks or get into the hall.

name: Dream Hotel Master
description: Manage and operate your dream hotels, expand your business, enhance hotel services, and attract more guests to create a unique five-star hotel!

name: Descent the Abyss
description: Descent the Abyss - you take on the role of an experienced detective who goes in search of a lost traveler lost in a dangerous underground labyrinth. You must explore dark and twisted corridors, solve puzzles, fight monsters, and overcome traps to navigate through danger and find the missing person.

name: Book of Spells
description: Book of Spells is an adventure game with RPG elements. You will take on the role of a traveler eager for new adventures!

name: World Fantasy 2
description: World Fantasy 2 is a classic RPG set in a fantasy world where there is an eternal struggle between the forces of good and evil. The protagonist will travel through the game world hoping to find the four heroes who once defeated the evil.

name: Zink
description: A unique puzzle game with serene, procedural graphics and timeless gameplay. Bump cubes into the ocean, until only one remain, and you have sunk the island!

name: Prison of Illusion: Gold Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Prison of Illusion
description: A young vampire is imprisoned in a supposedly abandoned castle. Help him escape from this magical prison.

name: Prison of Illusion: Ultimate Edition
description: A young vampire is imprisoned in a supposedly abandoned castle. Help him escape from this magical prison. This version also includes other complete games.

name: Gay Sex Adventures: Episode 7
description: An erotic VISUAL NOVEL featuring HD GRAPHICS and realistic-looking characters. Tony and his two assistants jet off to an overseas conference aboard the company’s luxurious private jet. The Mile High Club welcomes them in great style.

name: 9Shot
description: This game is purely for catharsis; there's no main storyline and it will never conclude "9Shot" is a first-person shooter game set in a zombie-infested Tokyo streets. Your objective is simple: survive against waves of zombies for as long as possible. Earn points by killing zombies to upgrade weapons

name: All Elite Wrestling: Fight Forever - Elite Beats and Stampede Expansion
description: AEW: Fight Forever Elite Beats and Stampede Expansion is FREE to ALL AEW: Fight Forever players and features five new music tracks and 20 new skins! A very special thank you to the fans that made AEW the fastest growing wrestling promotion.

name: All Elite Wrestling: Fight Forever - Season Pass 4
description: AEW: Fight Forever Season Pass 4 includes access to THREE DLCs: World War Joe featuring Samoa Joe, Rated Gold Superstar Pack featuring Adam Copeland, plus the Switchblade Tournament Pack featuring Jay White. PLUS a freebie DLC: Elite Beats and Stampede Expansion!

name: All Elite Wrestling: Fight Forever - World War Joe
description: AEW: Fight Forever World War Joe DLC features Samoa Joe - the only wrestler to hold the AEW, ROH and TNA World Championships, PLUS the all-new Japanese shrine map, two new attire options and 11 new moves including signature taunts.

name: Pixel Paint Together
description: A relaxing color by numbers game! Color with your friends! Lots to paint! No hidden fees!

name: Omori x Yume Nikki Crossover Fangame
description:
Madotsuki goes on an adventure with her friends in Headspace!

Battle enemies and find useful effects!

name: Pac-Man Mega Tunnel Battle: Chomp Champs - Lunar Animals Pac
description: Show off your favorite Lunar Animal style with these cosmetic items as you eat to compete!

name: Pac-Man Mega Tunnel Battle: Chomp Champs - Namco Pals Pac
description: Celebrate your passion for PAC-MAN's Pals with these cosmetic items as you eat to compete!

name: All Elite Wrestling: Fight Forever - Ultimate Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: King of Pyramid Thieves
description: In the riveting adventure game, King of Pyramid Thieves, you step into the shoes of a skillful thief seeking fortune.

name: Animal Puzzle for Kids and Toddlers
description: Fun Puzzles for Little Hands - Learn, Play and Grow

name: 15 in 1 Solitaire
description: Biggest Solitaire combo - can you beat all the game modes?

name: Our Souls Never Sleep
description: Player will face choices that determine their fate and the fates of the friends they make along the way in this psychological horror game.

name: Cooking for CrabTopia!
description: A minigame collection. You are the new arrival in town and boy oh boy does CrabTopia need some help! Their seasonal festival is about to happen and they don't have the ingredients to cook for everyone.

name: Wanderer's Guide to Ocean and Islands
description: Wanderer's Guide to Ocean and Islands is a game that combines elements of a walking simulator and a visual novel.

name: Sky Marksman
description: Sky Marksman is a fast-paced game where you aim and shoot ducks flying across your screen. Click 'Start Game' to begin, and remember: every duck that reaches the bottom ends the game.

name: Depths of Despair
description: Welcome to Depths of Despair, a thrilling solo/multiplayer game where you must fight off waves of enemies to survive for a set amount of time. With each wave, the enemies become stronger and more challenging to defeat. Can you and your team hold out long enough?

name: Tubedle
description: A webgame that lets you see how well you know your favorite youtubers

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Then Wake to Weep
description:
Version 2.2 of Honkai: Star Rail, which includes:
• New characters: Robin and Boothill
• New Trailblaze mission: The Fool Always Rings Twice
• New areas: Dreamflux Reef, Soulglad Festivity Auditions and Penacony Grand Theater
• New quality of life updates
• New main event: Clockie Dreamjoy Memoir
• …and more!

name: Vagrant Moon
description: Vagrant Moon is a charming 3D platformer that captures the classic feel and simplicity of PS1-era games. The game invites you on a serene treasure hunt through its vibrant landscapes, where every treasure not only enhances your abilities but also unlocks new areas of the enchanted valley to explore.

name: Europa Universalis IV: Winds of Change
description: Winds of Change makes wide-ranging changes to twenty nations stretching from the Andean highlands to the vast steppes of Mongolia. There are many new branching missions, government reforms, events, estate privileges and more!

name: Climbing In Barrel With Double-Barrel
description: This is a challenging game about climbing in barrel with double-barrel.

name: Level Up! Factory
description: Commander! Manage your shelter with survivors in a abandoned nuclear power plant. Search resources to make different types of boxes, send expeditions, repair work areas, face enemies to defend your facilities, deploy drones and rc cars, prepare for special events and more. All in real-time.

name: Below Surface
description: Fast-paced 3D horror game about exploring a supernatural cave

name: Soul King: Out of the Box
description: Lynn must call on her abilities and blasters once agian to brave the dangers of this new land, face new nightmares, and find the pieces needed to get legendary creator and dream weaver Grimzo Out of the Box

name: Bison Battle Machine
description: Bison battle machine – merciless battles on powerful tanks. Survival races and tough battles with realistic physics.

name: V Rising: Legacy of Castlevania - Premium Pack
description:
Introducing the Legacy of Castlevania Premium Pack in collaboration with Konami Digital Entertainment. This pack includes new cosmetics that allow you to take on the storied aesthetics of hair, clothing, and forms from one of the all-time classic Vampire franchises. Invoke style and indulge in your Castlevania nostalgia alongside the action-packed V Rising experience you’ve come to know and love.

The Legacy of Castlevania Premium Pack contains Alucard’s Regalia, a 5 piece cosmetic set, that can be crafted in-game using cloth and coarse thread when you unlock the tailor bench. 3 unique shapeshifting variants with the Wolf Form variant: Soul of the Wolf, Human Form variant: Glamour of Maria Renard and Toad Form variant: Guise of The Flea Man. 5 new hairstyles with Alucard, the Lecarde sisters and two Succubus variants. Rowdain's famed skeletal steed and adaptations of the Castlevania music tracks "Bloody Tears" and "Simon’s Theme" by V Rising composer Aleksandria Migova.

Then drape your walls, floors, and most valued places of power in the style of Castlevania with the Ancient Symphony item set that includes the Coffin, Throne, 5 Wallpaper Variants, Floor Pattern, Gate with a Servant Lock variant, 4 Stairs variants, Carpet (Corner, End, Straight, T-Section, X-Section), Candelabra, Glass Window - Wraith, Glass Window - Vampire, Blood Fountain, 2 Paintings, Statue of Alucard, Statue of Maria, Evolved Being (Statue), Bone Trophy and Angelic Statue.

name: No.9
description: Synchronizing form and time.

name: V Rising: Legacy of Castlevania
description:
In collaboration with Konami Digital Entertainment, Stunlock Studios proudly presents Legacy of Castlevania!

The mighty hero of the Belmont Clan, Simon Belmont, is here to challenge all of Vampire kind. Wielding his legendary Vampire Killer and an infamous arsenal of holy weaponry, no night stalker will be safe from his righteous crusade through Vardoran. Defeat him and unlock the secrets of a brand new weapon, the whip, adapting new combat abilities that embody the grace and precision of the deadly Vampire hunter!

Legacy of Castlevania is a free update releasing as part of V Rising's 1.0 update as it leaves Early Access. The new whip weapon is now a permanent addition to the game and there will always be some way to learn it, while Simon Belmont’s presence is indefinite.

name: Jumping Orb
description: Jump, challenge, collect, win!

name: Quadrillion
description: "Quadrillion" presents an immersive alternate-history experience set in the backdrop of a darkly reimagined First World War. This first-person game masterfully blends elements of dark fantasy with a unique retro aesthetic, offering players a captivating and eerie world to explore.

name: Nooo! My Body!
description: Breathtaking jump and run with an incredible story and unforgettable gameplay, in which you control a severed head! Don't forget to vote this masterpiece as Game of the Year.

name: Fear the Moon
description: A story driven cryptid horror game about a werewolf creature named "the Wolfman". Play as Jane along with her three friends who unknowingly camp the night in The Wolfman's territory deep inside an Ohio forest.

name: Alien Bob
description: Alien Bob is a fun but challenging, retro, precision platformer, spread across fast paced open areas and more intricate, precision based, enclosed areas, with a variety of environmental dangers and enemies along the way.

name: Home Simulator
description: A relatively casual and free exploration game, where you will be exploring a villa. Most of the items in the house are interactive, and you can freely make a mess in the house!

name: The Neurochemical Conjob
description: Eliminate your negative emotions (but save the good ones!) as Agent B. Cell, in this intense and wacky arcade style shooter!

name: Soul Hero Adventure
description: A pixel-styled bullet hell strategy magic/fantasy CRPG

name: The Island
description: O maior desafio em the island é sobreviver. Tudo quer que você morra - seja a vida selvagem da ilha ou outros habitantes,Faça o que for preciso para sobreviver.

name: Crazy Animal Choir
description: A casual game where you create music using various animal sounds. You can compose your own music, perform yourself, and manage your own choir.

name: Fallen Seeds
description: As Evod, a special agent of the Earth Empire, you embark on a thrilling adventure to the enigmatic planet of Ulthar, inhabited by the zoomorphic tribe of the Flock, a biotechnological extraterrestrial civilization. Your mission is to unravel an ancient mystery that holds the key to your destiny.

name: Unnamed Experiment
description: What could be more disorienting than finding yourself in a point-and-click puzzle game with no words at all? You wake up in a cell, surrounded by symbols and traces that make no sense. An atmospheric journey awaits. Immerse yourself in piecing clues together, but don't get lost in the surreal world.

name: Cosmic Roads
description: Do you think you can complete the roads mysteriously built in outer space? It is time to put your driving skills to the test in this difficult game that requires skills, patience and perseverance. Put on the mantle of a cosmic rider and complete the beautiful roads in outer space.

name: Pocket Oasis
description: Pocket Oasis is a hand painted gardening game. Decorate balconies in cities around the globe. Watch your seedlings grow, bloom, and harvest your own fruit.

name: Project Asteroids
description: I have no feelings. I have no fear. I don’t know where I am, only my aim. I must work. And I’m working. My modules are outdated, but as long as they are, I’m useful. My body is rusted, but as long as I can move, I’m useful. I’ll hold on to the stone and live. I have no feelings. I have no fear.

name: Model Eight
description: A shoot em' up with a manga inspired look. Destroy enemies, and use their salvage to gain more power.

name: Gift
description: When the protagonist wakes up, he finds himself on a luxury cruise ship. The game revolves around the story of his attempts to escape from the sinking ship and a group of passengers he feels nostalgic about.

name: Parkour Legends
description: A precision platformer with air-tight controls, inspired by the thrill of movement and momentum in free running. Sprint, slide, roll, rebound, grab onto ledges, and run across walls to complete hundreds of hand-crafted courses as quickly as possible (and find hidden collectibles along the way).

name: Fay's Factory
description: Fay’s Factory is a strategy-rpg. Build a factory and produce complicated spells for your visionary sorceress, argue to the death with both the elites and the working class, travel the world of the magical industrial revolution, and damn — try to make a living among this mess.

name: Strongloween: The Escape
description: Live the adventure of Torkin, prisoner of STRONGLOWEEN. Discover powerful items and fight bosses that will prevent you and other prisoners from escaping. Strongloween holds many secrets, will you discover them all?

name: Solo Leveling: Arise
description: Solo Leveling: Arise is an action RPG based on the South Korean web novel of the same name.

name: V Rising
description: Awaken as a vampire. Hunt for blood in nearby settlements to regain your strength and evade the scorching sun to survive. Raise your castle and thrive in an ever-changing open world full of mystery. Gain allies online and conquer the land of the living.

name: Space Raiders
description: Embark on an intergalactic journey in this adrenaline-pumping 2D space shooter! Pilot your sleek spacecraft through treacherous enemy armadas as you battle to save the galaxy from imminent destruction. With intuitive controls and fast-paced action, blast your way through wave after wave of alien invaders. Dodge incoming fire, shoot enemies in this thrilling arcade-style adventure. Are you ready to become the hero the universe desperately needs?

name: Unveiling the Unknown
description: Welcome to Balethorn Manor, where five maids are waiting to serve your every need and desire. By the day, talk to your maids, fall in love, and make love. By night, dive into an expansive dungeon system and collect untold riches to level your maids and upgrade the manor!

description: Climbing through the steep Sequoia Valley, this route set in the Badgers Pass county connects Fox City and Elk River to Wilmington and finally Sequoia Falls. This route includes 4 new sessions, and CP AC4400CW and SD40-2 locomotives, and UP SD40-2 locomotives.

name: Archery Simulator 2

description: Knoblins is a delightful little toy that lets you hatch musical creatures and perform songs for an ever-growing audience. Knoblins is designed to be very approachable and easy for anyone to pickup and play, whether you are musically inclined or not!

name: X-Plane 12: Aerosoft - St. Tropez
description: Based on the latest image sources, highly detailed objects were created at and along the airport. In addition, the villages La Mole and Le Moulin Roux were upgraded with individual autogen. The photo texture covers an area of approx. 26km² and thus covers the entire traffic pattern.

name: The Cursed Tape
description: A short horror game about a mysterious videotape that someone slipped under your door. Do you dare to watch it?!

name: Xargon: Remake Ep. 2
description: A remake of the classic 1993 DOS video game Xargon.

name: Hentai Luna
description: Embark on a relaxing journey with Hentai Luna, where calming levels await as you progress, soothing your mind with each solved puzzle.

name: Utsurobi no Serentia

name: Roguelites in Space
description: Two roguelites in space! Enjoy a deck building and a space shooter with generated systems and enemies! Make your builds on each run and survive to the end!

name: Clériga
description: After 82 years of Xyvran's defeat, Clériga must venture herself into her palace to repair the seal she put on the demon that prevented her infinite regeneration. This surreal horror experience puts you on edge as you need to find your way to the top of the castle while enemies slow you down, making you die slowly but surely, as your blood is being absorbed by the second.

name: Earn to Die Rogue
description:
Drive cars through the zombie apocalypse and loot infested buildings in this thrilling sequel to the hit Earn to Die series!
The zombie apocalypse is more dangerous than ever. New zombie and enemy threats have emerged and will do anything to chase you. Loot supplies, find and upgrade cars, and do whatever it takes to survive.

name: Veins Like Tapeworms
description: Who needs a moral compass when you have a god in the gutter?

name: Nerobi
description:
This indie game is a 2D scrolling platformer with several elements typical of a graphic adventure, featuring some cinematic sequences. It is all hand-drawn.
The gameplay is definitely challenging. It requires coordination and timing, and you have to use your wits. Different powers are unlocked as you go along, expanding the gameplay experience.
In addition, scattered around the world, there are several hidden cards to collect.

name: Apex Legends: Upheaval
description:
When Alter emerged from her dimension into another (with her past held close to the chest), she had only two things: her interdimensional traveling Void tech, and a desire to have fun. She stole the fanciest of foods, learned to fight through dicey situations, and took on odd jobs for personal favors–though she didn’t have a problem double-crossing her clients if it was more beneficial or amusing. Never needing to stick around for the consequences of her actions eroded any sense of morality or responsibility she had. She could focus on what was important: making sure life was never mundane.

Alter was drawn to worlds on the edge of complete destruction. Whether something devastating was already happening or she helped usher in the apocalypse herself, she was there to watch whatever catastrophe ensued. It was only in those moments, after all, that people took off the masks they always wore and she could see their true selves.

Finding these world-ending events was a toss up. Sometimes she’d find what she was looking for, and on others, she’d have missed the main event in worlds already ruined. But in some of these ruined worlds, Alter began to notice an interesting commonality…

Many of these worlds hadn’t met their end by some random event; they had been destroyed by the same person.

[Redacted]

name: Little Lookouts
description: Sin descripción

name: The Sleeping Sickness
description:
The Sleeping Sickness is an interactive short story that allows the player to guide the main character's actions.

Each day, the player chooses where Grayson investigates. The player’s choices will lock and unlock future locations, change dialogue, and alter the story. Choices matter in The Sleeping Sickness.

While The Sleeping Sickness includes sounds, graphics, and interactive sections, it focuses on the story.

The game is designed to play like a choose-your-own-adventure book and is an excellent choice for horror fans, avid readers, and lovers of creepy pastas.

name: Bottakuri Taxi
description: Customers... Don't let them find out... Rip-off! A thrilling rip-off adventure where if the customers find out, you'll explode!

name: Trace
description: Third-person RPG with messenger tracking exploration

name: Who's the Boss
description: The game features a variety of game modes, each with its own unique challenges and objectives.

name: Screen Wonders
description: The best screensavers and live wallpapers, all in one app.

name: Fall Words
description: Fall Words is a challenging physics puzzle game that has you type letters to drop them and collect all the asterisks. Letters have different shapes and physics and based on that there are various mechanics in the game: bridge, domino, hanging, rolling, and more! Try it now and see how words fall!

name: Tower Defense: Infinite War - Infinite Starter Package
description: This content requires the base game Tower Defense: Infinite War on Steam in order to play.

name: Lost Meow
description: In the winter city, a cute cat fights for survival, begging for food from pedestrians and warming itself on manhole covers. Avoid dangers like passing cars, hostile dogs, and unfriendly pedestrians. Help the kitty get home in this captivating arcade!

name: Syke
description: Syke is a first-person exploratory puzzle game set in a mysterious and beautifully warped reality. You play as an individual making their way through areas of strange geometry; solving puzzles to piece together the story of their love.

name: Farm Together 2
description: Grow your own farm all by yourself, or cooperate with your friends in the long awaited sequel to the cozy, relaxing farming experience!

name: Icy Dungeon
description: Cursed to conjure a slick trail of ice with each step you take, navigate puzzles and obstacles with precision and wit. Can you outsmart the icy curse and escape the cold depths of the dungeon?

name: Ancestral Hunter
description: An Action VR game where you are a hunter tracking down escaped monsters. You will be able to place traps and shoot the monster. Use the environment to your advantage. Monster contacts will be received from your truck.

name: Hode
description: Hode is a retro style Shoot 'em up, where you fly through 5 unique zones and battle various enemies. Customize your ship, with the many different power ups by accumulating points earned through defeating enemies.

name: Chipped
description: A computer game, survive a motherboard world while overcoming electrifying hazards and glitchy enemies in this sprawling, third-person open world.

name: Genome Guardian
description: Genome Guardian is a top-down roguelite turret shooter where you must defend yourself from hostile aliens at the microscopic level. Combine & discover 70 weapons across 4 modes using a vast array of turrets, perks, modifiers and power-ups on this vibrant journey to the depths of the abyss.

name: Stellaris: The Machine Age
description: It is an age of technological glory, rapid social change, and unbridled ambition… But in the depths of space, a danger unlike any before encountered is about to emerge, a looming threat that will throw the very meaning of life into question.Welcome to The Machine Age!

name: Free Will
description: Free Will is a 2D psychological puzzle RPG where the puzzles happen outside of the game. Dig deep into the system code to fix the corruption, and uncover information that might be better off hidden.

name: Candyland: Sweet Survival
description: Uncover the ominous mysteries of an abandoned chocolate factory. Navigate eerie levels, solve sinister puzzles, and outwit malevolent entities. Collect precious candies, unveil the factory's secrets, and confront the darkness. Are you brave enough to explore Candyland's dark secrets?

name: Jumping Steve
description: Jumping Steve is a 2d arcade style indy casual roguelike game. Stay on the crows. Collect the thingies to increase your score so you can unlock stuff. With over 2 Achievements, about 56 probably. Power ups. lot of settings to change Works on computers Not compatible with the gameboy camera.

name: The WereCleaner
description: Kyle is a Janitor. He's also a Werewolf. And now he's got the night shift. Fight for your life - and your paycheck - in a stealth-comedy game with surprises around every corner.

name: Whispers in the Void
description: The main hero John Eikts wakes up in a mysterious room for supernatural creatures. Anomalies escape, wreaking havoc. Eikts must navigate the chaos while uncovering his dark past. As he approaches freedom, a shocking twist reveals that he is not a victim, but one of them.

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Mavado Kameo
description:
Mavado, a commanding leader of the merciless Red Dragon Clan, returns to the Mortal Kombat Universe.

Purchase this pack and receive Mavado as a Kameo Character to assist you in fight.

name: Projeto Real
description: Projeto Real is a game where you shape your virtual life. Choose professions, build authentic relationships and explore a wide, vibrant world full of fascinating NPCs. Face challenges, explore stunning landscapes. Live a complete virtual life, full of unique adventures.

name: Kamla
description: Play as an Indian exorcist who is tasked with banishing the evil spirit that’s taken over a newly-wed woman named Kamla, in this first person horror game inspired by Indian traditions and folklore.

name: Rainbow Cream Saga
description: Welcome to Rainbow Cream Saga, a kickass melee action survival game with some RPG vibes! You can craft weapons, build bases, capture mounts and much more! Come through on this epic adventure and test out your survival skills.

name: Nancy Drew: Mystery of the Seven Keys
description: Get ready for a thrilling blend of adventure, mystery, and history in the latest installment of the award-winning Nancy Drew game series – Nancy Drew: Mystery of the Seven Keys! This all-new 3D game experience transports players to the heart of the historic city of Prague as they assume the role of famous detective Nancy Drew. Tasked with uncovering the truth behind the theft of a client’s heirloom necklace, players will navigate and sleuth through the beautiful city’s mysterious old-world environments. Encounter challenging puzzles, decode riddles, and discover clues entwined with medieval legends, alchemy, and lore. As the investigation deepens, Nancy uncovers a sinister web of cybercrime. Players must outwit devious suspects and use their detective skills to unravel a mystery threatening the city’s Bohemian heritage. Danger and intrigue at every turn add to the suspense as the criminals stop at nothing to prevent you from bringing the truth to light. Your investigative and critical thinking skills are crucial to solving the case and discovering the real mystery behind the legend of the seven keys!

name: With My Past
description: "How should I face my past in my ever-changing life? "Listen to her inner voice and solve these challenging puzzles to help her face her past self.

name: Cannibal Tales
description: Horror thriller visual novel written by cult director Ruggero Deodato. A cannibal story in three episodes. Embark on a challenging journey, where every choice has a price and consequences. Will you be able to reach the end without getting your soul devoured? Dare to decide!

name: Duck Life 9: The Flock
description: Raise your ducklings into the ultimate team of racers in Duck Life 9, where everything is bigger, bolder & more beautiful than ever before! Embark on a quest as you journey across the huge Featherhaven Island, meeting new friends & taking on recruits to help topple the competition & take the crown!

name: Path of Achra
description: A turn-based roguelike with an emphasis on hero customization and powerful items. Fight through the dangerous lands of Achra to reach the horrors of the Obelisk, and discover what lies beyond...

name: Heading Out
description: Hop into a muscle car and drive through the American West in a game inspired by 1970s road movies. Enjoy the ride in this narrative-driven racing experience with a comic book aesthetic. Choose your own route across the USA in a game where every run is a personalized, unique experience.

name: Brocula
description: Embark on an enchanting journey as Brocula, a vampire awakening after centuries. Earn money through part-time jobs, explore the town, salvage your castle, and enhance your vampire skills. Unleash your dark reputation, amass fortunes, and shape your immortal legacy.

name: Close Encounters
description: Deflect one or more balls to targets for collection. Each planet presents a challenging array of targets that must be collected to the waiting UFO above.

description:
After reading a book about certain place, Melody embarks in a journey to have an exciting adventure. What dangers await her there?

First shown in the Winter C3 of 2023, this was a showcase of a simple spritesheet, and then became his own thing. This was a project of one year, circling back to january of 2023 all the way up to january of 2024.
Without further ado, the full thing

Players will lead teams of fantastical heroes through intricate PvP and PvE battles in a world where the lines between life and death are deeply entwined.

You and your friend have a cosy little night in planned. Your chosen activity would raise a few eyebrows if anybody found out...
But nobody is going to find out.
It's only a bit of harmless fun.
Nothing could go wrong.

...Could it?

name: Yakuza GB

Head to space in Ono Michio Space Defence; A short space shooter starring the beloved mascot.

What would happen if the game of the Snake was mixed with the legend of Quetzalcoatl?

Well, that is Quetzi.

Based on the Teotihuacan imagery, Quetzi will challenge you to complete the body of the Feathered Serpent through different worlds, sorting all kinds of obstacles…

and defeating mighty gods.

name: Cazzarion: Whack A Zombie

name: Prey at the Altar
description:
You are the chosen lamb of the Church of the Hound, a sacrifice to summon an ancient god to cleanse this earth of its sins. It's an honor!

You want this. You want this very badly. Everyone wants this for you. The Church, its people, its god. So the choice is obvious.

You are the lamb. Prepare yourself for slaughter.

name: Manaulyn
description: An action-adventure game based around a dog rescuing a lost friend from a hydra and kraken. Shoot magic at the mythicals and take them out as you explore the forests of an abandoned Earth. Defeat the Kraken and Hydra to win the day.

name: Circoid
description: One-button precise, dynamic 2D platformer. Collect pixels, open doors, avoid obstacles and enemies. Find your way to the finals and unlock the next levels.

name: Swords & Bones 4
description: The fourth installment of Swords & Bones immerses you in a new fantasy adventure, with pixel art in a side-scrolling action-platformer style. In this latest chapter, harness the power of magic to emerge victorious!

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021: Jeep RAM Remastered
description: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021 - Jeep | RAM Remastered DLC includes 6 cars: 2016 Ram 1500 Yellow Sport - 2013 Ram 3500 - 2012 Jeep Grand Cherokee SRT8 - 2012 Jeep Wrangler - 1949 Jeep Willys Civilian - 1942 Jeep Willys Military - V8 HEMI 345 - V8 HEMI 392 - V6 Pentastar G - I4 WIlys L134

name: Forest Fellers
description: Forest Fellers! A game about Gnomes, Trees, and chopping them. Generate wood as you hire your very own Forest Fellers (Gnomes) to fell forests YOU make. Your Gnomes will grow and level up the more they chop allowing you to get more and more efficient trees for them to take down.

name: Timber Tales
description: Explore, upgrade and chop away!

name: Rei: A Girl With Wings
description: REI is a gliding action adventure game inspired by 『ICO』 and 『Portal』. Become a small but brave boy in a ruined world and fly while holding the hand of a winged girl. Jump through space and time with the necklace. Uncover the secrets of the abandoned laboratory and escape.

name: Trauma: Pro Wrestling
description: I'ts TRAUMA Pro Wrestling! Fight in all sorts of match types, such as cage match, last man standing, electric barbed-wire, ironman and MORE! Customize your experience down to the most minute details in order to create your very own dream match and experience our 5 stars Career Mode!

name: Dudelings: Arcade Sportsball
description: Dudelings: Arcade Sportsball is a fast-paced sportslike. A cross between Pong and Foosball, this title brings high-energy local mutiplayer fun to the table!

name: Area 51: Beyond The Wall
description: Join the top-secret mission to defend Area 51, the world's most enigmatic military base. With fast paced action, realistic combat, and a dynamic environment, 'Area 51: Beyond the Wall' will immerse you in a thrilling and challenging experience. Play now and see if you have what it takes!

name: Betrayal Beach
description: Crashed on a strange island, survivors must forage, craft, and complete objectives to stay alive. But ferocious beasts, harsh weather, and secret saboteurs seek to make sure they never escape. Betray your friends or survive the island in Betrayal Beach, a 4-8 player social deduction survival game.

name: Croakoloco
description: Croakoloco is a frog collecting idle game. Watch them jump, croak, and eat delicious flies. Grow frogs, feed frogs, or take control of one in “Froggy Mode” for a more active play style!

name: Grønland
description: Explore the frozen North, investigate your past, and try to remember... or forget. Grønland is a mysterious adventure game set in the lower Arctic of the late 19th century.

name: Pecker
description: Pecker offers a unique climbing mechanic in a colorful world filled with puzzles and some enemies.

name: Chainmail Bikini
description: Join Brandi the Red and her heroic companions as they hunt monsters for fun and profit in this RPG game!

name: Hades II
description: Battle beyond the Underworld using dark sorcery to take on the Titan of Time in this bewitching sequel to the award-winning rogue-like dungeon crawler.

name: Star Leaping Story
description: Players will help a white-robed girl and her friends uncover the truth of the planet using unique dash gameplay. The storyline is fully voiced by renowned actors, with meticulously designed levels and energetic music for you to enjoy!

name: Monster Crawl
description: Hack & slash your way through monster hordes with fast paced, active combat. Well timed attacks can annihilate entire rooms, but don't get caught! Explore diverse builds using multiple heroes, abilities & relics. Fight through dungeons full of treasures & traps, and challenge mighty Bosses!

name: Cosmic: A Journey Among Shadows
description: An action-adventure game set in a multilayered universe where light and shadow dictate its metaphysical rules. As a naughty little creature, embark on an interdimensional journey across space and time to rescue your sole and best friend — 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐬𝐡𝐚𝐝𝐨𝐰

name: Plushie from the Sky
description: A charming souls-like hack & slash. Play as a little fallen angel, explore dreamy landscapes, shoot down corrupted monsters and fight challenging bosses with a plushie.

name: Sumo
description: Sumo is a multiplayer physics-based party game for up to 4 players, featuring silly spherical characters with unique powerful abilities. Use a combination of mobility and tactics to survive the longest on Arenas which are just as much of a threat as your human or AI-controlled opponents.

name: Psychopomp
description: Play as Hermes, the Psychopomp, tasked with collecting letters left around the ruins and delivering them to trains running across the vast ocean. Fly, glide, and explore forgotten ruins.

name: Siren Head: The Arrival
description: Siren Head: The Arrival is a horror mod for Minecraft which adds in Trevor Henderson's iconic monster "Siren Head" into the game. During regular gameplay, Siren Head roams around the world and stalks the player. Watch out, you may hear him before you see him.

name: Wish You Happiness
description: Move with 'WASD', switch characters with the number keys

name: Clash for Crust
description: Clash for Crust is a 2-4 Player local multiplayer party brawler. Customize and take control of a Crazy Gull and fight using your Seagull Attacks and Power-Ups to grab the Golden Crust and to battle for the honor of becoming Top Gull.

name: Hélène est dans mon Ventre.
description: You follow a troubled girl whose only friend is her talking tapeworm inside her belly. This one will help and advise her in order for her to get closer to the person she loves.

name: Teeth of Glass
description:
It begins with one cut.

You play as Doctor Joshua Hagstrom, as he finds himself trapped in an otherworldly fever dream. Just who is the mysterious patient? How can Dr Hagstrom escape? And will he live to see his family again?

Teeth of Glass is a short point & click horror fever dream, with two different endings.

name: Happiness Inc.
description: Inspired by Shark Tank, this short romcom visual novel lets you present yourself and answer your prospect client's questions to convince him to marry you. Good luck, and show off your flirting skills in a business manner.

name: Frozen Honey ASMR: Nasty Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Ninja Shuriken Master
description: Become the Master of Deadly Shurikens!

name: Pokémon Yellow Legacy
description: a Pokémon Rom Hack made by TheSmithPlays with the intended purpose of fixing Pokémon Yellow into a more polished experience while staying true to the vision of Generation 1's Yellow.

name: Dark Discoveries
description: In this chilling horror experience, immerse yourself in the eerie confines of a desolate house consumed by anomalies set loose by a devastating virus. Equipped with only a camera and flashlight, your sole objective is to document evidence of these sinister aberrations while navigating the looming threat of their lethal grasp. Prepare for spine-tingling encounters around every corner, where each photograph captured could mark your demise. Will you unravel the origins of the virus before succumbing to its sinister machinations, or will you become yet another casualty swallowed by the abyss? This game combines elements of horror and puzzle-solving, promising a gripping and immersive journey into darkness.

name: TriMatch
description: TriMatch, the addicting puzzle challenge where you must match colorful triangles to score big and conquer each level! Strategize and align triangles based on their colored sides to rack up points and unlock the next level. Dive into the world of TriMatch for an addictive and brain-teasing experience that will keep you coming back for more!

name: Park Studio
description: Park Studio is a next-generation park building and simulation game that lets you create the park of your dreams with intricate details and next-level quality! The only limit is your imagination!

name: Unbroken
description: Unbroken is a Sports Simulation Roleplay Action Game with Pro Kick Thai Boxing Elements. Create a newbie and become a Superstar, get the golden cup and fight your way to the top. Not only is it a sports game, but there are also more mini-games and surprises waiting for you.

name: Cat Meoir: Feline Detective
description: Cat Meoir: Feline Detective is an open world exploration game based in the heart of New York City during the early 1950's. The player must use their cat-like skills to solve puzzles, string together clues, and navigate the city to solve the case of their owners murder.

name: The Way Of Kings
description: 《The Way Of Kings》is a love and war based real-time action role-playing game.It tells the story of an ordinary man named Qin Shihuang, who experiences countless fantasy adventures in the end times to conquer the world, unify Kyushu and become emperor.

name: Introspection
description: IntroSpection is a top-down bullethell-like action game about a man forced to confront his past. Delve into memories and blast through waves of inner demons as you explore one man's mental purgatory.

name: TR-12
description: Defeat all monsters and survive for twenty minutes using your keyboard (or gamepad) to simultaneously move and shoot, running into powerups, like Haste and Nuke, in this newly hand-crafted shooter inspired by 16-bit classics like Smash T.V. and Contra.

name: Event Horizon
description: Event Horizon is an action-adventure sci-fi shooter with the heart of souls-like utilizing gun modification and first-person scanning to explore the unknown depths of the cosmos.

name: The Land of Magic
description: Are you a challenger? Master obstacles, complete worlds and set new high scores. Play new challenges every day by racing against the clock, collecting stars or crossing mysterious obstacles. Play the current season and get exclusive rewards for your ghost.

name: Find My Weiner
description: Embark on a whimsical journey through vast and vibrant fields of grass to reunite with your beloved weiner. But this isn't just any weiner—it's your four-legged friend who's gone on an adventure of their own! This game offers a blend of humor, heart, and the untold thrill of the hunt.

name: 24H Stories: Midnight Channel
description: 4 storylines, 3 victims, 2 crises, and 1 horror story that requires the use of the butterfly effect.

name: Hibernation
description: “Dormancy” is a unique survival game where players are summoned to a frozen dream. In this dormant realm, mysteries and challenges abound, and only by bravely confronting them can one hope to uncover the truth.

name: Formilion
description: Kill till you get through. Formilion is a top-down arcade blood shooter about a searching a person.

name: Legend of Utorepia
description: The Last Hero departs for the mysterious world of Utorepia.What you see at the end of that journey ...? Feature-length retro RPG!

name: Bugz Bows & Curses
description: Collect all the Bugz Bows and Curses you can in a procedurally generated rouge like. But be carefull as other bugz can and will get mad.

name: Devil War
description:
Devil War is a 3D first-person shooting game. Doom is coming, take your sniper, ready to eliminate all devils and save human!

Experience the sniper action game! Are you ready for the challenges?

name: Entomophobia
description: A Singleplayer Rougelite Bullethell where you kill 10s of thousands of insects/bugs. including mini-boss/boss fights every 5-10 minutes. Slay Bugs, Get Upgrades, Kill more. Unlock Characters and weapons by completing achievements.

name: Below the Oak
description: This game serves as a sequel to Bane of Oakenshade with some recurring themes but a much darker tone. There are no shops so resource management will be important. Prepare to enter the bleakest dungeon you can imagine. A huge map to explore. Build your character up and defeat the final boss. Plenty of lore to indulge in if desired. It's cold, dark, grim and unforgiving.

name: Sonic UltraSaturn
description: Sin descripción

name: Topac Battle: Supporter Pack
description: This content requires the base game Topac Battle on Steam in order to play.

name: Pet Crossing
description: A cruiser came to a blue planet and found a planet with many ice-blocked caves, which contained frozen animals that were sent in before the catastrophe. Only paired animals could survive after thawing. The expedition team needs your wisdom to help match these animals and restore life to the planet.

name: Galactic Starfire: Squadron
description: Galactic Starfire: Squadron is a Future Sci-Fi Space Shooter game set in different environments around the universe. Complete the challenges and stay alive as you progress through the different types of levels.

name: Zopa
description: Meet the new game! In the role of Little Red Riding Hood's relative, you will go on a forest adventure. Throw explosive pies, meet wolves, pigs, gnomes and other inhabitants of the forest. Funny cutscenes, voiced dialogues, unique locations - every step is a new challenge!

name: Trash Pandamonium
description: Get ready for Trash Pandamonium: the ultimate couch co-op party game! Control colorful raccoons, beat the trash out of opponents, and dominate dynamic maps full of hazards. Customize your raccoon, gather your crew, and prepare for pandamonium!

name: Homebound Mariana
description:
The lemon shark tailed mermaid warrior Kaisa is out on her daily patrol when she notices that the sea is somehow... upset. The balance of nature has been disturbed, and monsters of the deep have been let loose into the salty waters.

On top of that, a nearby research submarine is broadcasting an emergency signal. Kaisa sets out to investigate, and hopefully find answers and solutions. Restoring the balance of the ocean is up to her!

name: Hentai Dating Stories: Brazil
description: Travel to Rio de Janeiro with Touji to meet his date – Tainara. Solve puzzles to unlock the story and discover what outcome awaits.

name: Bucket Crusher: Cool Kidz Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Simply Snakes
description: Grow as big as possible!

name: Eternal Light
description: Animation System Visual Novel "Eternal Light."

name: Two Faced
description: Sin descripción

name: The Simuloid Affair: Infinite Possibilities
description: You've wanted to be a sim hunter ever since the incident in the Preservation Dome. When you finally made it in the Agency, you put your all into it, deleting simuloids at a rate second only to your partner, rival and best friend, Ursula. And then your routine Mental Diffusion test came back positive. Are you really a simuloid yourself? Are your memories fake? Is being a simuloid actually a bad thing? Is the entire simuloid panic a hoax perpetrated by the Conglomerate?

name: Corgi's Travel
description:
A scientist is conducting experiments with a machine that can shrink objects. To ensure safety, he decides to do the experiments a bit away from his house, but he makes the mistake of bringing his dog along.

Without the scientist noticing, the dog accidentally presses the machine's button, getting shrunk and gaining superpowers. Thus begins the dog's journey back home, trying to find a way to reverse the effect and return to normal size, while facing various challenges, including giant insects.

name: Rogue Light Deck Builder
description:
Rogue Light Deck Builder is a digital wooden board game.

Your house needs a deck. You have a hammer. You have wood and you have nails. The light outside is faulty. You work, you earn. Freedom is $1,000,000.

Build a deck. Use your hammer. Drive the nails in. Scrimp and save. Freedom is just around the corner.

name: Chefcito Asesino
description: In this game, we embody an extremely angry rat that must defend itself from the sewer monsters to survive. We have a variety of weapons at our disposal to achieve this.

name: FreshBallFall
description: Colourful 3D-platformer where you help your Ball-friend in his adventures through different levels and obsticles.

name: GuardFortressVR
description: Due to racial differences, battles often break out, and you, as the new king of mankind, are determined to unite the continents and rid the world of war. But only if you accept races from other continents. From then on began the journey of unifying the continent!

name: Protocol Five
description: Protocol Filve is a surreal first-person adventure with multiple endings, you will find yourself in a world where some rotten things want to kill you. Some choices along the way drastically and irreversibly change the game, leading to one of the 5 possible endings.

name: Bob the Block: Rebooted
description: Bob the Block Rebooted is a pixelated indie platformer heavily influenced by recoil mechanics. You must use your ability to jump paired with your infinite ammo gun to traverse 40 difficult stages. Conquer anything from large, expansive jumps to tight, precise maze-like levels.

name: Crimson Hell
description: Crimson Hell is a survival-horror game in which you play as Sae, a journalism student determined to find her missing sister. Traverse through three nightmarish realms, collecting limited resources, fighting monsters, and solving puzzles in order to escape and uncover the truth.

name: Jack Styler
description: Former FBI agent and fishing enthusiast, faces an alien-zombie apocalypse after a virus escapes from NASA. Determined to rescue his wife, he defies the FBI and embarks alone to confront the threat. An epic rescue mission filled with action and suspense!

name: Fusion Nexus: Alchemic Evolution
description: Embark on an alchemical journey in this vibrant 2D adventure! Craft unique monsters, engage in turn-based battles, and liberate the region. A fusion of exploration, crafting, and thrilling combat awaits in Fusion Nexus: Alchemic Evolution.

name: Phantom Blaze
description: Phantom Blaze is entirely inspired by the bravery of Indian Commanders and their killing instincts. Hunting for weapon and equipment to kill the opportunity while saving themselves remain the fundamental spur throughout the game.

name: Slav Junkie Simulator
description: You live in a small soviet slav eastern european cyberpunk city. You have severe heroin addiction that you need to sustain. Heroin is very expensive and earnings in a rural city are very small, barely enough for survival. Survive one week.

name: Dead World
description: Embark on a great journey through the dead world controlling Adam Jones, who will search for answers about the kidnapping of his friends, dodging death on more than one occasion

name: NTR Boss
description: When your boss is an asshole who ruins your life - it's time to take revenge and steal his wife!

name: Titan Fury
description: Titan Fury is a mobile action strategy game featuring massive Titans commanding the battlefield and armies colliding in epic battles. Play the single-player campaign or team up with friends for exciting online cooperative battles. Prepare to command your Titans, train your armies, and save Aurica!

name: Signal Control Simulator
description: The job of a "signal worker" is to protect the safety of Japan's railways behind the scenes. Operate the interlocking panels to safely and accurately operate trains that run in seconds. You can experience the work of a signal attendant, which is essential for safe railway operation.

name: Mystic Valley
description: 2D action adventure and puzzle game heavily inspired by the first Legend of Zelda game.

name: Memory Quickie
description: Embark on a nostalgic journey with Memory Quickie, the classic card-matching game reimagined for the digital era. Test your memory and concentration as you uncover pairs of cards in this timeless pastime.

name: Suika Jelly Game
description: Merge cozy and bouncy fruit jellies to create watermelon. The goal of the game is to merge watermelons and watermelons. How many watermelons can you merge?

name: DCS World: Kola Map by Orbx
description: Orbx proudly presents the DCS: Kola map, which covers northern Norway, Sweden, Finland, and the Russian Murmansk Oblast and parts of the Karelia region.

name: Ghost Light
description: The ghost Light is a light-spooky, mystery-oriented RPG. You will play as a girl named Mary, exploring dungeons to find escape codes and escape paths in the face of ghosts and traps.

name: My Dog!
description: MY DOG! is a puzzle game where you have to collect puzzles in the form of pictures and memes with the antics and misadventures of a cute dog (My Dog!)

name: Train Simulator: Payerbach - Wien Hbf Route Add-On
description: Explore the east side of Austria from Wien (Vienna) to Payerbach with this Train Simulator route from RSSLO.

name: The Smurfs: Colorful Stories - Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Fantasy Tower
description: Game Purpose：Who can take the least days, Way up HT tower top? We tell you: You're buy the future of this game HT Version 1.0, Only Support to 5 floor Least a week or month, we will update and add some feature.

name: Ngolf: Colorful Golf Balls 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Twizzle Puzzle: Horses
description: Twizzle Puzzle: Horses - is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime.

name: Bob Fight
description: BobFight is a hilarious party game for 2 to 4 players where you play as quirky characters in a series of chaotic mini-games. Take on your friends in uproarious challenges, earn crowns, and become the undisputed king of the party! Who will be the last Bob standing? Find out in BobFight!

name: Almost Dungeon
description: Almost Dungeon reverses the roles by making you play a Dragon protecting his Dungeon. Arrange the corridors into a labyrinth of your liking and fool the adventurer who dared to enter your lair. Place traps in his way as fast as possible to get rid of him before he finds and slays you !

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 3 - Episode 05
description: Season 3 Episode 5: Love and Blunder. Katy crashes a lame old skatepark to find her best friend Blondie a cool date for prom!

name: Angel Legion: Bay Goddess - Purple II
description: Embark on your adventure with player from all over the world! Lead your Angel team to reveal the ancient mysteries of Galaxy…… Welcome to Angel legion, a free RPG gacha game with good fun!

name: Boneless VR
description: Boneless is an experimental Virtual Reality physics sandbox game built to test the limits of what's possible in VR. The game features unique maps, unique weapons, such as guns and swords and multiple enemies.

name: The Survival Horror Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Murder Diaries Series Bundle
description: This bundle features the Murder Diaries Series - a pack of 3 story-driven flight exploration games. In each of the games you will experience an exciting murder story while exploring the landscapes and piecing together the overall story.

name: Ngolf: Colorful Golf Balls 6
description: Sin descripción

name: Ngolf: Colorful Golf Balls 5
description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Ngolf: Colorful Golf Balls 2
description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Baking Time: Speedy Animals
description: Sin descripción
