description: Sin descripción

name: My Horse Stories: Summer
description: Sin descripción

name: My Horse Stories: Fancy
description: Sin descripción

name: Freaky Trip: Director's Cut
description: Sin descripción

name: Knight Sim Life
description: "Knight Sim Life" offers a compelling blend of city-building, farming simulation, and strategic combat.

name: Pirates Golden Quest
description: Are you ready to become the ultimate pirate legend?

name: My Horse Stories
description: Get ready to make unforgettable memories and experience the beauty of the countryside like never before!

name: Yacht Haven Tycoon: Marina Port Parking Simulator
description: Anchor Your Dreams, Build Your Empire. Navigate the Waves of Success in Yacht Haven Tycoon: Marina Port Parking Simulator!

name: Oneirophobia
description:
"I'm Gary Walker, just an average 27-year-old office worker. Always hunting for cheaper places to live.

So, when I heard about this super cheap apartment, I ignored the rumors of people going missing. I mean, there's always a catch with cheap rent, right?"

name: Bomb Cat
description: Match ultra-fluffy cats to achieve the highest score and unleash chaos with Bomb Cat.

name: Blood Lines: Magicians' Chase 2
description:
Enter the enchanted Mysterious Castle inhabited by zombies, maids, and vampire!
Witness legacy unfold in 2D PIXEL ACTION ADVENTURE!

name: Baking Time
description: Get ready for the ultimate bakery game that will satisfy your cooking fever and love for pastries!

name: Amelia's Diner
description: Help Amelia to run her diner and serve delicious food and make your customers happy!

name: Soraja Towers
description: Sin descripción

name: Office Cat
description: Embark on a unique entrepreneurial journey in a world ruled by cats! You are the boss of a burgeoning business empire, where adorable kitties lead the charge. Prepare to build, expand, and manage your way to riches.

name: Sanae's Sylphid Breeze
description:
This is a remake of the old version.

Sanae has Kirby's signature method of dispatching enemies by using the ability of inhaling with extreme power. By pressing X button repeatedly, Sanae is able to fly for as long as she likes to reach higher platforms or to find secret item locations.

name: Cyber Citizen Shockman 3: The Princess From Another World
description: Sonya and Arnold battle a new mysterious enemy in Shockman 3!

name: Crimes: Open Cases
description: Crimes: Open Cases is a video game offering a series of cases that will put your skills to the test. You will have to investigate crime scenes, complete challenges to get clues, and crack the case based on the information you obtain. In addition, your prestige as an investigator is at stake. Burnish your reputation by earning more points in every challenge and shedding light on the dark secrets of each case.

name: Nearly Friendly Tribes
description: Join the action-packed world of Nearly Friendly Tribes (NFT), the low-poly First-Person Shooter by Block Bastards. Battle it out in beautifully designed arenas, armed with Interoperable weapons. Are you ready to dominate the competition?

name: Keeper's Curse
description: Welcome to the mysterious and haunted island of “Keeper’s Curse”. In this action-packed survival third-person shooter, you’ll face relentless waves of cursed creatures while unraveling the secrets of the island and striving to escape its sinister grasp.

name: Working On It
description: Im Working On It ( the description )

name: Asian Foxes
description: Cute Asian Foxes wag their tails and pin their ears. They are alert and sniffing with their noses, one claps her hands and the other even bares her fangs in excitement. You go to meet them.

name: Relict
description: Relict is a sci-fi 3rd person action adventure roguelike shooter with a unique tarot twist on player abilities and enemies. Taking the role of the fool, fight your way through three unique planets to save the universe from a great evil.

name: Legends of Aria: Classic
description: Legends of Aria Classic: Rediscover the thrill of MMORPG adventure with reverted ruleset to 2019, including the Karma System and original protected areas. Forge your legacy in a player-driven world of endless possibilities. Join us on a nostalgic journey into classic MMORPG gaming!

name: Two Bad Fellas
description: In this first person, horror, casual game, you have to protect your Teddy from the Two Bad Fellas. Find quickly a safe spot to hide your buddy and than move him to the next one. Explore the house and solve riddles but be aware, if you hold your Teddy for too long, you will be in big danger!

name: Tea Talk
description: "Tea Talk"? Are you a grumpy old man? Or a doormat? Or is there someone else?

name: KunKun Defender
description: Oh no! The Kun Virus has broken out. A group of zombies infected with the Kun Virus is using Iron Mountain to crazily ram into any living creature. You must pick up your gun to fight against the onslaught of Kun-infected zombies until Big Joe arrives in a helicopter to rescue you.

name: Hentai Tales: The Entrance To Isekai
description: You discover a door to another world, which leads to another world's tavern. This pub has beautiful girls of all different races and they are full of lust. What will happen there?

name: Inner Struggle
description: How long can she resist the unbearable weight of her own mind?

name: Su: Unlocking the 4th Dimension
description: SU is a 2.5D deduction puzzle game. The submarine Nautilus suffers a mechanical failure during its voyage. Dr. Pierre investigates and finds anomalies in every area. Explore the deep blue depths, follow Dr. Pierre as he unravels the secrets of the Nautilus.

name: Not Alone
description: Not Alone is a first-person mystical horror game where you need to escape from a terrifying house. This house may look familiar to some, but that's only at first glance. Read the notes to understand what happened and search for ways to escape.

name: College Sex Fest 2024
description: Dive into a whirlwind adventure as a freshman college student navigating the thrilling highs and tantalizing lows of campus life, all while gearing up for the legendary "SEX FEST."

name: Killcolor
description: A rougelite top-down shooter where you collect random upgrades to kill hostile color entities.

name: Sync
description: Launch the SYNC protocol, where you are the ultimate weapon. Your job is to commandeer different robotic synth’s abilities in a high-octane, first-person frenzy. Master the art of SYNCing, and control the pace of battle.

name: Molementum
description: Molementum is an online party platformer in which you and up to three friends compete to become the best thief. Upgrade your mole's abilities to aid in your criminal escapades. Compete, steal, and heist in this wacky, fast-paced game.

name: Seeds of Paradise
description: A short side story set in the same universe as "Sylvie's Bar" featuring a different flavor of monster girl brothels. You play an overworked man who's all but run out of luck, but the sadistic strawberry girl who keeps the business running may just take pity on you, yet.

name: Exit Slum 11
description: Exit Slum 11 is an anomaly observation running simulator with an eerie atmosphere.

name: The Collection
description: A First person, Short story indie horror game with an immersive atmosphere.

name: Idle Hero TD
description: Endless idle tower defense game full of deep strategy and combat mechanics. Unlock and upgrade dozens of epic fantasy heroes to defeat an infinite swarm of enemy monsters. Strategize hero placements, synergies, and skills for an effective defense, then sit back and let the auto-battler do its thing!

name: Subway
description: Detect even the smallest change and safely reach the destination station.

name: Pocketing the Ball
description: Dive into the 3D Billiards Simulator, boasting lifelike graphics and physics for an authentic pool hall experience. Challenge your skills and strategy in a game designed for precision and adaptability, ideal for both intense practice and relaxed play.

name: Dimenshift: Direction is Meaningless
description: A minimalist sci-fi 2D platformer where you shift through walls and machines. Explore and find secrets in a strange, maze-like dimension, where the laws of physics don't seem to make sense.

name: Flank Speed
description: Flank Speed is a simple top down Newtonian space shooter based on the aesthetics and style of early 90s arcade games. Everything from the designs, textures, sounds and gameplay are made to capture that arcade feel in a simple yet enjoyable game.

name: Operation Breadcrumbs
description: A management and narrative game set in a world of birds! Play as Robin and return home to revitalize your late Pa's bed and breakfast, forging meaningful connections as you rebuild the community in the face of an encroaching corporation.

name: Screamboat Willie
description: Do you LOVE Steamboat Willie? Great! He's in this game! Do you HATE Steamboat Willie? great! He's gross and scary and you are trying to dodge him and ultimately get away from him! So basically no matter what this game is for you!

name: Outbreak: The Fedora Files - What Lydia Knows
description: Something is foul in the city of Cypress Ridge. Uncover the truth in this narrative rich visual novel taking place just moments before a full blown undead epidemic.

name: Slash Abyss
description: Slash fate, Break free! 'Slash Abyss' is a light roguelike RPG. You play as a powerful but amnesiac character. Join your 'deceased' comrades, equip yourself with diverse items, and unravel the story's secrets, all with the goal of achieving 'resurrection'."

name: Collect Call
description: A puzzle platformer about cooperating and exploring.

name: Abyss
description: Explore the abyss!

name: I Commissioned Some Mice 4
description: I paid more artists to hide mice and cheese in 15 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Cult ni Kibishii Gal: Cult vs. Gal
description: Make mincemeat out of cults and chop heads with machetes! Old school shooter staples and gals, and a familiar difficulty level. Ye shall witness a new struggle!

name: Crop and Claw
description: Crop and Claw is a classic-style JRPG centered around dragons in a lush realm known as the "Garden". The plantlife has gone awry, bringing a time of decline and stress across the realm. Return to the era of simple questing, dungeons, and progression.

name: Checkers Twist
description: A turn-based strategy game, Checkers Twist is a variant of the checkers board game, where the board is irregular and procedurally generated, offering new tactics each game.

name: Kagami: An Odyssey in Japanese Language Learning
description: Retro-style RPG themed around finding and learning vocabulary words in Japanese, playing minigames, and using discovered vocabulary to gain advantages when fighting enemies based on yokai from Japanese folklore.

name: Dungeon Minesweeper
description: Dungeon Minesweeper is a unique roguelike based on a minesweeper! Explore the dungeon, bypass the bombs, defeat the boss and get out of the dungeon!

name: Cozy Space Survivors
description: A cozy time survival roguelite in space. You steer the shippy while the shooting happens automatically. Meet cute NPCs, solve small quests, and fight quirky enemies with satisfying weapons. A short experience for people who don't have much time but love playing (and finishing) games.

name: Mareld
description: Mareld is a card-driven Roguelike role-playing game where you play as a traveler lost in the Lost Forest. You will recruit companions, collect resources, craft items, explore the world, defeat enemies, find your way back home, or uncover the secrets of this extraordinary world.

name: Bloodkill
description: Brutal First Person Shooter focused on action, speed, gore and blood-pumping metal music.

name: Surveillance
description: Surveillance is a psychological horror in which you have to prevent high paranormal activity In different places around the world. Identify suspicious changes in environment and take immediate action!

name: Mortarmen
description: Mortarmen is a strategic multiplayer PvP first and third person shooter, pitting the New American Coalition versus United Communist Front in a battle for control of Arakousa, a Mediterranean paradise, where soldiers traverse via sliding, rolling, climbing, and HALO drops.

name: The Braves
description: Demolish hordes of enemies and survive against all odds! Unlock different characters, find powerful skill combinations and embark on an exciting journey through the variety of very different worlds in this cute but unforgiving roguelike game!

name: Shell of a King
description: Test your strength in Shell of a King! A precision bullet-hell adventure that will push your dodging skills to the limit. Challenge tough bosses, uncover secrets, and explore a world left to ruin in this top-down RPG.

name: Feather Party
description: Welcome to the fantastic party on the adorable planet of chicks! Feather Party is a multiplayer party game for up to 8 players. Engage in a diverse array of fun mini-games with friends or against rivals to be the winner of this party!

name: Ingression
description: Ingression is an unforgiving & mind-bending precision platformer where you'll think and platform with seamless portals. Play as Rina, a thief living in the year 2442 in the corrupt Galactic Empire. Travel to the future to save the past from a tremendous time paradox. Fulfill your destiny of keeping time intact.

name: Forest of Tails: Arena
description: Forest of Tails: Arena is a real-time action arena game that pits you against bugs, animals, and even other mice. Fight your way through waves, gain new skills, and loot powerful equipment to fight your way to the top.

name: Tempus Bound
description: Tempus Bound is an artistically-driven pixel platformer with physics, puzzles and a speed running mode. In a desolate world, you play as a mysterious bushbaby/owl/fox hybrid with a dark past. Scramble across the world of wind temples & swamplands to reach your ultimate destination.

name: Chrono Ark
description: Chrono Ark is a party-based deck-building roguelike single player RPG game about rescuing the world from chaos. Recruit, train, and build a team of unique investigators throughout the abandoned land and restore the Twisted World!

name: Drone Attack: Pig Irruption
description: Drone Attack: Pig Irruption is a fast-paced, action-packed mobile game where players control drones to fend off a mischievous invasion of pigs. Utilize a variety of drones, including the powerful new Combat Mosquito, to strategically destroy waves of pigs. With exciting new features like soul absorption mechanics, quick bomb access, and a revamped interface, this game offers intense fun for those who enjoy tactical challenges and destruction. Join the battle, crush the pig invasion, and watch sunflowers grow where enemies fall!

name: Brawl Stars: Godzilla
description: Sin descripción

name: Fruit Salon
description: Welcome to the Fruit Salon! Step into the shoes of a skilled fruit and veggie doctor and embark on a journey through a colorful world of healing and fun.

name: Find X
description: "FindX is an all-age suitable first-person casual shooting game, where players need to find differences in two time-frozen and similar worlds, and use a variety of quirky weapons to address these discrepancies."

name: Puppet Master: The Game - Dark Horse Skins
description: Sin descripción

name: Chrono Ark: Summer Twilight
description:
Summer-themed DLC for Chrono Ark, featuring a new, optional boss with her own substory, new equipment and relics, as well as swimsuit skins for Lucy and 5 investigators, with accompanying VFX.

The investigators obtaining a new skin are Azar, Charon, Huz, Pressel and Trisha, with Sizz slated to receive one in a future content update.

name: Undead Inc.: Worky DLC
description: Unlock a Director: Weaponized Worky. A customized version of Worky's Office Rentals' Robot Receptionist by the same name, Weaponized Worky has come to work really hard and punch stuff sometimes.

name: Touhou Danmaku Kagura: Phantasia Lost - Touhou Mystia's Izakaya Collab "Beneath the Purple Cherry Blossoms Once Again"
description: A collaboration between 『Touhou Danmaku Kagura Phantasia Lost』 & 『Touhou Mystia's Izakaya』 is here! The in-game music 『Beneath the Purple Cherry Blossoms Once Again』 from the popular restaurant simulator 『Touhou Mystia's Izakaya』 will be playable in this new added content. Don't you miss it!

name: Sclash: Sakura
description: Spring is here, and with it sakura petals as sharp as steel. Unlocks a sakura-themed weapon and mask to use in the game.

name: MotoGP 24: Nolan Helmet Liveries
description: Hit the track in style and add 4 special liveries for the Nolan X-804 RS Ultra Carbon Helmet!

name: MotoGP 24: Test Suits
description: Dive deeper into the MotoGP atmosphere and get a race suit inspired by the sleek 'total black' aesthetics often seen during pre-championship tests for each top-class team!

name: Bear Warrior
description: Be a hero Bear with sword and bow and kill fat sumo and find hidden golden skulls

name: Trainz 2022: C44aci Locomotive - ARG/Mineral Resources Pack
description: The C44aci is a model of Australian heavy duty diesel electric locomotive designed by UGL Rail and built at the Broadmeadow factory. It is operated by a number of rail freight operators, including ARG and Mineral Resources on a variety of freight services across Australia.

name: Trainz 2019: C44aci Locomotive - ARG/Mineral Resources Pack
description: The C44aci is a model of Australian heavy duty diesel electric locomotive designed by UGL Rail and built at the Broadmeadow factory. It is operated by a number of rail freight operators, including ARG and Mineral Resources on a variety of freight services across Australia.

name: Trainz Plus: C44aci Locomotive - ARG/Mineral Resources Pack
description: The C44aci is a model of Australian heavy duty diesel electric locomotive designed by UGL Rail and built at the Broadmeadow factory. It is operated by a number of rail freight operators, including ARG and Mineral Resources on a variety of freight services across Australia.

name: Party Party Time 2 + Duo Pack Set
description: Sin descripción

name: X-Plane 12: Aerosoft - Airport Zurich V2.0
description: The Airport Zurich is the largest airport of Switzerland, now in a brand new version for X-Plane. This completely new scenery is full of details, including every building and the entire airport environment, De-Icing and all features you would expect from a modern X-Plane scenery.

name: Pikubo
description: Dive into the delightful world of Pikubo, a captivating puzzle game that brings the excitement of cubic nonograms to your mobile device. With a unique twist on a beloved classic, Pikubo challenges you to carve out shapes from a larger cube by removing unnecessary blocks.

name: Cherophobia
description: You find yourself stranded in a forest after your car breaks down. A short psychological horror game.

name: Assetto Corsa Competizione: 2024 Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Homeworld: Vast Reaches
description: Immerse yourself in a bold new story in the beloved Homeworld saga that brings real-time strategic space battles to VR. Your fleet is at your fingertips in this all-new game where you can execute strategic attacks on your enemies from any direction or angle.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: AcceleRacers Free Pack 2
description: Piledriver takes its name from a wrestling move that leaves no opponents a chance. Technetium, on the other hand, is a beauty shrouded in mystery. The only thing that won't be a mystery is that they will take you straight to the podium!

name: South Park: Snow Day! - Snowball
description: The all-new snowball is perfect tool for all those who mastered the other weapons in the game. Unleash devastating new effects on enemies and grant powerful supporting effects on your allies too.

name: Super Dungeon Maker: Pets Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Swipe Right or Left Geography Binary Quiz
description:
Northern or Southern Hemisphere?
Swipe to Decide in This Binary Geography Quiz!

name: Hentai Tales Bundle
description: Exciting puzzles with a plot and stunning anime illustrations.

name: Hentai Tales Vol. 3
description: A new part of exciting puzzles telling about Hitomi's adventures in space.

name: Ninja Flip
description: Leap into the air — where every flip is a fight for survival and every jump writes your legend.

name: Tractor Farming Simulator 3D
description: Are you ready to till the soil, sow the seeds, and reap the rewards?

name: The Purge Club: Kyuusai! Shukusei Circle
description: In the name of the client, pretty and shy Seina will punish you!

name: Train Your Brain! Spot the Difference with Dog Photos
description:
Spot the Difference in Puppy Photos!
Enjoy brain training while being soothed by adorable dog images.

name: Smack
description: Step into the retro world of "Smack," where you'll face off against a swarm of tiny cube monsters inside a simulated arcade cabinet. Your job? Slam them down before they take over!

name: Slot & Learn Kanji
description:
Discover Popular Beautiful KANJI!
Study KANJI Fun with Games

name: Bruce and Box
description: Unprecedented shocking game! Real "box" action controlled by a cardboard box!

name: Beach Girls 2: Sports in Bikini
description: Discover the fascinating world of beach sports as you venture to win the heart of the girl of your dreams.

name: Arcade Archives: Rastan Saga
description: Save the kingdom of Ceim from the monstrous dragon!

name: Highway Racer
description: Sin descripción

name: Freddi Fish Collection
description: 5 of the most popular Freddi Fish games in one epic collection!

name: Biocatalyst
description: Biocatalyst is a short horror visual novel set in the late 1990s with a PC-98 aesthetic.

name: Jet Set Steamboat Willie
description: 2024 sees Steamboat Willie entering the Public Domain and the 40th anniversary of Jet Set Willy. To celebrate this milestone, Sloanysoft is proud to present a wee tribute to these classics for you to enjoy on your ZX Spectrum.

name: Smalland: Survive the Wilds VR
description: From the world of Smalland: Survive the Wilds, immerse yourself into a new epic single-player adventure as a Smallfolk in a gigantic world. After centuries living underground, the Smallfolk emerge from their burrows to reclaim the Overland now that the giants have gone. Explore, scavenge, craft and build as you fight to gain a foothold in this hostile new world.

name: Truck Simulator Cargo Driver 2024: USA
description: Sin descripción

name: Magic Farm
description: Magic Farm is a simple and short bullet hell

name: DNA: Episode 5
description: The DNA action rpg franchise is created by a solo dev as an episodic side scrolling action hack and slash beat em up, story-driven 2d anime that welcomes the world into the DNA universe. You play as the main character Leo to find his true purpose in life. Thus begins the fascinating story of DNA!

name: King of Hell
description: King of Hell is a 6-player, online, Arcade Party Game. You play against your friends in a arena filled with random Items and Jump'n Run obstacles. Try to knock your opponents into the lava to stash points and then climb up to the top platform, to score your points and become King of Hell!

name: Poltergeist Watcher
description: Can you survive the night watching the cursed house?

name: Night at the Cabin
description: During an investigation in the wilderness, you stumble across a cabin in the middle of the woods. Trapped inside, you must survive for five nights until the police can get to your location, all while avoiding the mysterious "Widow of the Woods." For years she was thought to be a myth. Until now...

name: Mr. Woodpecker
description: You play as a detective investigating an empty hotel. You are close to solving the mystery of this hotel. Explore the rooms, look for items that will help you pass on. And do not forget to read the tips of the detective, for whom you play will periodically give out.

name: Money Farm
description: Hey you! Ya, you! Are you a poor, broke loser who is down on their luck? If the answer is yes, then oh boy, does Soke Co. industry have the deal for you! For the low low, price of 1 billion dollars, Soke Co. industry will lease you one of their patented money farms! But wait, a billion dollars isn't a low price for you. Never fear, friend Soke Co. won't ask for anything upfront, and after you start, money will grow on trees. It's a deal too good to be true. So what are you waiting for? Sign up for your money farm today!

name: Mission: Mars
description: Protect Mars from waves of enemies in "Mission: Mars." As Sergeant Eric, lead your team through 60 intense days of battle. Choose suits, upgrade weapons to ensure the survival of humanity's future on the Red Planet.

name: Skeleton Village
description: Old dilapidated houses, crumbling planks, an old moldy well, an oppressive atmosphere and limited space. The walls erected around the perimeter put pressure on the nerves.

name: Run and Hunt: Skeleton Rebellion
description: You are a brave traveler who got lost in a dark labyrinth, beware of the evil skeletons. The evil skeletons know where you are, and they are already hunting you. Can you defeat them?

name: The Adventures of Lily & Leo
description: Discover the magical world of Lily and Leo and help them find their faithful companion Quattro in this captivating puzzle adventure. Set up a tripod, follow animal tracks, have clever conversations and much more to track down the missing dog.

name: The Last Spin
description: The last spin originally named 'Casino?' is a deck-building roguelike that disguises itself as a slot machine. How many spins until the last spin?

name: Will I Survive Tonight?
description: Unravel the secrets of your inherited house in this eerie survival adventure. Craft, explore, and confront the unknown to escape the nightmare within.

name: Wandering Planet: Prelude
description: Star Trek: Prelude is a space-based game that builds defense towers on earth to defend against alien invaders called Black Ember.

name: The Legend of Snow Maiden
description: "The Legend of Snow Maiden" is a turn based role-playing game inspired by ancient Chinese mythology. The player takes on the role of the brave female hero Akira Sakura, embarking on an adventure to search for the reincarnation of the Golden Boy and the assistance of the Snow Maiden.

name: Sowon : The Toy Wonderland
description: One night, the attic door, the one that was always closed, slid open, sending a girl falling into a strange world. Will she ever be able to get back home?

name: Mega Mosaic
description: Mega Mosaic is a meditative game about completing a single enormous puzzle

name: Lord Of Tower
description: "Lord of Tower" is an action RPG game. Climb the tower and meet the bosses on each floor.Defeat bosses with unique patterns and win in battle. Conquer all the bosses and become the true lord of the tower!

name: Pocket Idler: Fishing Pond
description: Welcome, aspiring angler! Pocket Idler: Fishing Pond is the first cast in a series of relaxing and casual idle games designed to deliver bite-sized satisfaction.

name: Break It!
description: BREAK IT to BREAK OUT. A 2D arcade-like game inspired by the classic game Brick Breaker

name: Lords Mobile
description: Lords Mobile is an online strategy game that combines the excitement of clanwars

name: Solendara
description: Enigmatic Hack and slash style Action RPG where ancient mythology and magic blend with modern civilization~A story that reveals the forbidden, the desires, and the secrets of the world~

name: The Horrible Inside
description: You have to plunge into the depths of madness and uncover the dark secrets that lurk within. With every step you take, you will encounter paranormal phenomena and ghosts of your past.

name: Bobr Kurwa
description:
Bobr Kurwa is a roguelike top-down shooter inspired by Polish Beaver memes, Nuclear Throne, DotA, and, strangely enough, Genshin Impact. The focus of the game is on hardcore gameplay.

You control 3 unique heroes at once, each with distinct spells that can be upgraded. The goal is to escape from Poland through a dangerous forest and a crowd of enemies.

name: Lila's Synthetic Shadows
description: The stakes are high, and the danger is real in this thrilling cyberpunk adventure. Follow Lila's journey as she delves deeper into the shadows of Neo-Tokyo, utilizing her skills as a hacker to unravel the mysteries surrounding her job.

name: Ai no Karakuri
description: The vast institute is home to numerous enemies and gimmicks. Use electromagnetic rifles, killer rays, and infrared rays to overcome the strongest enemies and gimmicks!

name: A Slight Chance of Sawblades+
description:
This is a special edition of A Slight Chance of Sawblades exclusively for Apple Arcade. The ads & microtransactions have been removed, but it requires a subscription to play.

A storm is coming, but umbrellas won’t help – it’s going to rain sawblades! Dodge, jump and somersault in an attempt to survive in this high-score chaser.

name: Dicey Dungeons+
description:
This is a re-release of Dicey Dungeons for Apple Arcade. It requires a subscription to play.

A fast-paced deckbuilding roguelike. Become a giant walking dice and battle to the end of an ever-changing dungeon! Can you escape the cruel whims of Lady Luck?

name: Summer Pop!+
description:
This is a special edition of Summer Pop exclusively for Apple Arcade. The ads & microtransactions have been removed, but it requires a subscription to play.

It is a vacation-themed match 3 game with over 4,000 levels to complete.

name: Spaced Out
description: Retro, classic, couch-buddy competition in space! Simple controls make it easy for friends and family to join in the fun!

name: Sift Heads Cartels
description: Embark on a thrilling trilogy as Vinnie, Kiro, and Shorty battle urban gangsters and the Italian mafia. Upgrade weapons, immerse in a bloody tale, and enjoy enhanced gameplay features. Fight, upgrade, and chase your targets in this action-packed adventure!

name: A Day in the Palace
description: Travel to Poland in 1772, experience life as a servant, and solve a mystery at court!

name: Mochi Sprint
description: You have become a "Mochi". A perfectly round Mochi. Navigate through 2D scrolling dungeons, avoiding brutal traps, and aim for the goal (mortar). That's all there is to the game.

name: Resonance chain
description: You are in a dark, repetitive hallway without light. This is a walking simulator where you navigate through the darkness using echolocation.

name: Mini Star Math
description: Mini Star Math is a cute and fun math mental computation game with 26 stages.

name: Meme Christmas
description: An incredible New Year's roguelike in the genre of Survival! Immerse yourself in the holiday atmosphere and hold out as long as possible from the hordes of Memes and defeat all the Bosses...

name: Mashiroiro Symphony HD: Sana Edition
description: A one-route standalone expansion for the fan-favorite visual novel Mashiroiro Symphony. The main character's classmate Sana finally takes the spotlight with a new story and new CGs by artist Tsubasu Izumi!

name: Mashiroiro Symphony HD: Love is Pure White
description: A winter-themed romcom visual novel with four main heroines and one mysterious cat-like creature! In a town where tradition and modernity meet, protagonist Shingo Uryu's whole life changes when he begins attending the prestigious Yuihime Girls Private Academy...

name: MotoGP 24
description: Challenge your abilities in MotoGP, Moto2 and Moto3 categories, and immerse yourself in the exhilarating journey of the 2024 campaign. Experience the thrill of official rosters and tracks exclusive to MotoGP24!

name: SP-Light
description: Race through levels as Splight the robot, soaring past obstacles at high speeds!

name: Chill Pulse
description: Chill Pulse combines productivity tools with serene environments. Use a Pomodoro timer and to-do lists to boost focus, while ambient sounds in settings from cyberpunk cities to ancient landscapes enhance relaxation.

name: Riptide
description: In Riptide, gear up your ship, customize your loadout, and fight for the fleet! Riptide is a spaceship combat game with an emphasis on powerful customizations and utility. Accomplish your mission by loading up and taking out the enemy.

name: Zombie Exodus: Safe Haven - Side Stories 2
description: Stories from the Outbreak, set 2 chronicles events of key characters at various points throughout Zombie Exodus: Safe Haven. These ten stories are noninteractive but focus on characters in the game and provide their backstories and events as they struggle to survive.

name: Touhou Kourinden: Mythos of Phantasmagoria
description: The epic beginning of the Federal Kingdom of Kozan.

name: No Strings Attached
description: No Strings Attached is a puzzle platform thriller where you play as Pavo, a newly-sentient puppet, in a struggling circus. Marionette Pavo's arms to swing, climb, and more to escape your Master's true intentions.

name: MX vs. ATV: Legends - 2024 Monster Energy Supercross Edition
description:
MX vs ATV Legends - 2024 Monster Energy Supercross Edition:
Compete like the pros on 16 official tracks from the 2024 Monster Energy Supercross Championship! All tracks are launching before the real world events.

name: Endless Ocean: Luminous
description: Dive in and survey a mysterious underwater world. Take a deep breath and plunge into the Veiled Sea: an unexplored region with discoveries that change with each dive. Encounter and learn about over 500 species of marine life—some of which are presumed extinct, or even mythical!

name: Dragon of Steelthorne
description: Rule a mighty city, fight battles and go on adventures as the Ardent or Ardessa of the city of Lake Steelthorne. Find love, power, and a secret that could change the world.

name: Trinity Survivors
description: Choose three characters with different styles to team up and combine their skills. Experience the amazing synergy of three characters. Play two-player co-op online with a friend. Defeat hordes of orcs and achieve high scores!

name: Party Pirates
description: Party Pirates is a couch co-op game where players become clumsy pirates traveling from port to port, taking on dangerous foes and sea monsters along the way. Gather your crew, don an eyepatch, and do everything to keep your ship afloat!

name: Mimic Search
description: Mimic Search is a short indie horror game, in which you take the role of a police officer investigating recent mimic sightings.

name: The Political Machine 2024: Cabinet of Curiosities
description: Dive into the ultimate customization experience with the 'Cabinet of Curiosities' DLC! Outfit your candidate with a wild array of gear, from Drengin heads to astronaut suits. Campaign in style or outlandish flair!

name: The Political Machine 2024
description: Win the hearts and minds of America’s voters and run for President in this political strategy game. Choose a candidate or create your own and run against the opposing party’s candidate or up to 4 primary candidates controlled by the computer or other players online.

name: Trash Troopers: Earth Reclaim
description: On a distopic future full of polution and contamination you will lead your Troopers to collect garbage, dismantle old oil facilities, build houses, crops and transform waste into incredible things like solar panels, water tanks, and recycling stations. Build your own greener town
